name: Metal Glove: Exodus
description:
Metal Glove: Exodus is a single-player top-down dungeon crawler.
Venture into the dungeon, facing off with hordes of enemies along the way. Continue to push deeper, surpassing puzzles, hazards, and more enemies as you make your way to finishing the quest you set out to complete, defeating the troll!

Key Features include;
- Hack-and-Slash combat
- Player abilities
- Multiple enemy types
- Environmental hazards & puzzles
- Boss fight
